Value.label: Remember relays state
Value.Help: This parameter determines the state of relays power supply failure (e.g. power outage). auto OFF and flashing modes the parameter not relevant and the relay will always remain off.

Item.label: Relays remain switched off after restoring power
Restore remembered state of relays after restoring power
Restore remembered state of relays after restoring power, but for toggle switches (parameter 20/21 set to 1) set the same state as the current state of the switches

Value.label: First channel - operating mode
Value.Help: This parameter allows to choose operating for channel controlled with Q/Q1 output. timed modes (value 1, 2 or 3), time is set parameter 154 and reaction to input is set with parameter 152.

Item.label: Standard operation
Delay Off
Auto Off
Flashing

Value.label: First channel - reaction to input change in delayed/auto OFF modes
Value.Help: This parameter determines how the device when changing state of S1 input in timed for first channel.

Item.label: Cancel mode and set default state
No reaction, mode runs until it ends
Reset timer, start counting time from the beginning

Value.label: Second channel - reaction to input change in delayed/auto OFF modes
Value.Help: This parameter determines how the device when changing state of S2 input in timed for second channel.

Item.label: Cancel mode and set default state
No reaction, mode runs until it ends
Reset timer, start counting time from the beginning

Value.label: First channel – time parameter for delayed/auto OFF and flashing modes
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set time parameter used in timed modes. (s)

Value.label: Second channel – time parameter for delayed/auto OFF and flashing modes
Value.Help: This parameter allows to set time parameter used in timed modes. (s)

Value.label: S1 Switch ON value sent to 2nd association group
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Switch On command to devices associated in 2nd association group.

Value.label: S1 Switch OFF value sent to 2nd association group
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Switch Off command to devices associated in 2nd association group.

Value.label: S1 Switch Double Click value sent to 2nd association groups
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Double Click command to devices associated in 2nd association group.

Value.label: S2 Switch ON value sent to 3rd association group
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Switch On command to devices associated in 3rd association group.

Value.label: S2 Switch OFF value sent to 3rd association group
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Switch Off command to devices associated in 3rd association group.

Value.label: S2 Switch Double Click value sent to 3rd association groups
Value.Help: This parameter determines value sent with Double Click command to devices associated in 3rd association group.

Value.label: Q/Q1 output type
Value.Help: This parameter determines type of Q/Q1 output.

Item.label: Normally Open (relay contacts opened turned off, closed when turned on)
Normally Closed (relay contacts closed turned off, opened when turned on)

Value.label: Q2 output type
Value.Help: This parameter determines type of Q2 output.

Item.label: Normally Open (relay contacts opened turned off, closed when turned on)
Normally Closed (relay contacts closed turned off, opened when turned on)

Value.label: Lock simultaneous switching of Q1 and Q2 outputs
Value.Help: When the lock is enabled, both outputs cannot turned on at the same time.

Item.label: Lock disabled
Lock enabled
Momentary switch
Toggle switch (contact closed - On, contact opened - OFF)
Toggle switch (device changes status when switch changes status)
Momentary switch
Toggle switch (contact closed - On, contact opened - OFF)
Toggle switch (device changes status when switch changes status)

Value.label: Inputs orientation
Value.Help: This parameter allows reversing operation of S1 and S2 inputs changing the wiring. Use in case of incorrect wiring.

Item.label: default (S1 - 1st channel, S2 - 2nd channel)
reversed (S1 - 2nd channel, S2 - 1st channel)

Value.label: Outputs orientation
Value.Help: This parameter allows reversing operation of Q1 and Q2 outputs changing the wiring. Use in case of incorrect wiring.

Item.label: default (Q1 - 1st channel, Q2 - 2nd channel)
reversed (Q1 - 2nd channel, Q2 - 1st channel)
